function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misallocation of resources in coronavirus response, diverting attention from other contagious diseases like influenza.","Impact":"Increased mortality from other contagious diseases due to resource diversion.","Mitigation":"Implement balanced resource allocation strategies that address multiple contagious diseases simultaneously.","Technologies":"Data analytics for resource allocation, advanced healthcare management technologies.","People":"Healthcare policymakers, funding organizations, government agencies.","Owner":"Healthcare policymakers, funding organizations, government agencies."},{"Description":"Enhanced detection and lower hospitalization thresholds may strain healthcare systems and increase mortality from other serious diseases.","Impact":"Strain on healthcare systems and increased mortality from other serious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement effective infection detection strategies while also ensuring adequate resources for other serious diseases.","Technologies":"Advanced infection detection technologies, healthcare management technologies.","People":"Healthcare policymakers, hospital administrators, healthcare workers.","Owner":"Healthcare policymakers, hospital administrators, healthcare workers."},{"Description":"Maintaining prolonged lockdowns may lead to worse consequences than an acute epidemic wave, impacting economic and social disruption.","Impact":"Worsened economic and social disruption due to prolonged lockdowns.","Mitigation":"Focus on protecting susceptible individuals and implement targeted interventions instead of prolonged countrywide lockdowns.","Technologies":"Targeted intervention strategies, data analytics for vulnerable population identification.","People":"Policy decision-makers, government officials, public health experts.","Owner":"Policy decision-makers, government officials, public health experts."}]}
